<js>
str1=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/小说/doulist");
str2=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/文学/doulist");
str3=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/历史/doulist");
str=String(str1+str2+str3);
reg1=/\d+(?=\?from_id)/gi;reg2=/[^>]+(?=<\/h3>)/gi;
id=str.match(reg1);name=str.match(reg2);x="";
for (i=0;i<id.length;i++){
name [i]=name[i].replace(/[^\-\s\d\w\u4e00-\u9fa5]/gi,"");
x+=name[i]+"::/doulist/"+id[i]+"?start={{(searchPage-1)*25}}&&"
}
result=x;
</js>

ruleFindUrl:
<js>
tmp=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/ranking/gender");
tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
function ff(a,b) {
	var x="";y=cate[a];u1="::/book/by-categories?gender=";u2="&type=hot&start={{(searchPage-1)*50}}&limit=50&&"
	for (i in y) {
x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;
		for (j in y[i].mins) {x+=b+y[i].major+"/"+y[i].mins[j]+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+"&minor="+y[i].mins[j]+u2;}
	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","[男]");f("female","[女]");f("epub","[出版]");
ff("male","[男]");ff("female","[女]");ff("press","[出版]");
String(result);
</js>
